DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine efficacy cogniVida™ learn memory performance ( executive function , associative , spatial verbal memory ) well mood attention parameter four , eight eleven week supplementation comparison placebo . cogniVida™ consider dietary supplement , therefore approve drug Food Drug Administration ( FDA ) . It regulate like food . The U.S. Food Drug Administration strictly regulate herb dietary supplement . The investigator claim supplement meant treat ailment .
DOC.brief_title: Effects cogniVida™ Learning Memory Comparison Placebo After Long-term Supplementation
DOC.criteria: Males Females , age 50 65 year Subject agree maintain habitual diet physical activity pattern throughout study period . Subject health condition would prevent him/her fulfil study requirement judge Investigator basis medical history routine laboratory test result . Subject body mass index ( BMI ) ≥18.5 ≤ 30.00 kg/m2 screening . Subject willing refrain consume alcoholic drink 24 h prior test day end assessment period refrain consume caffeine , caffeinecontaining product 12 h prior test day end assessment period . Subject willing refrain vigorous physical activity 12 h prior test day . Subject understands study procedure sign form provide informed consent participate study authorization release relevant protect health information study Investigator . Subject positive drug screen amphetamine , barbiturate , benzodiazepine , cannabis , cocaine , methamphetamine , methadone , 3,4methylenedioxymethamphetamine , opiates tricyclic antidepressant screen admission day . Subjects positive breath alcohol breath carbon monoxide test screen admission day . Subject abnormal clinical chemistry hematology laboratory test result clinical significance accord establish criterion . Subjects history renal hepatic disease likely interfere metabolism excretion test product . Subject donate 300 mL blood three month prior screen . Subject uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure ≥160 mm Hg diastolic blood pressure ≥100 mm Hg ) define average blood pressure measure screening . Subject history , judgment Investigator , psychological illness condition interfere subject 's ability understand requirement study . Excessive habitual caffeine consumption ( > 500 mg caffeine/d ) , follow screen throughout study period . Caffeine consumption assess use Caffeine Consumption Questionnaire Subjects significant hypocaloric diet ( i.e . < 1200 calorie per day ) aim significant weight loss . Use sleep aid medication within four day prior test day ( visit 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 ; day 0 , 28 , 56 , 77 ) . Subject history presence cancer prior two year , except nonmelanoma skin cancer . Subject pregnant , plan pregnant study period , lactate , woman consider childbearing potential engage active sex life unwilling commit use approve form contraception throughout study period . The method contraception must record source documentation . Use psychotropic medication within four week visit 1 , day 14 throughout study . Use dietary supplement contain following : lutein , ginkgo biloba , St. John 's wort , ginseng , gotu kola ( Indian pennywort ) ; daily dos vitamin E ( ≥30 mg/d ) folic acid ( ≥400 ug/d ) ; thiamine , riboflavin , and/or pyridoxine ( ≥2 mg/d ) ; eicosapentaenoic acid ( EPA ) , docosahexaenoic acid combination EPA + DHA ( ≥500 mg/d ) within 2 week prior screen . Subject exposure nonregistered drug product within 30 day prior screen visit throughout study . Recent history ( within 12 month screen visit ) strong potential alcohol substance abuse . Alcohol abuse define > 60g ( men ) / 40g ( woman ) pure alcohol per day ( 7 / 5.5 unit ) . Subject know allergy sensitivity study product ingredient study product meal provide . The subject unable perform test COMPASS System train establish acceptable level participation type study . Use stevia extract sweeten products/drinks stevia leave within 1 month study
